metadata.title: USN-6373-1 -- gawk vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that gawk could be made to read out of bounds when processing certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input, an attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6373-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gawk - 1:5.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
